issue.title: [Rust] Make ARROW_TEST_DATA and PARQUET_TEST_DATA absolute dirs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10915](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10915). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In rust/README.md,  both **ARROW_TEST_DATA** and **PARQUET_TEST_DATA** are set as relative path. The problem is: we MAY have to reset them back-and-forth across top and subdirectories – that's annoying. So, the obvious solution is: set the Env vars as absolute dirs.
